data.title: MEET.STUDENTS
data.description: A conference for students to present their research, innovations, and ideas in medicine, engineering, education, and technology.

data.title: MEET.SCIENCE
data.description: A scientific conference with presentations, seminars, and discussions on cutting-edge research and developments in various fields.

data.title: MEET.TALKING
data.description: An engaging session featuring non-academic science communication in the form of short presentations by scientists.

data.title: MEET.EXPO
data.description: An exhibition showcasing innovative projects, products, and services in medicine, engineering, education, and technology.
